General.Name: DCM Nouvelle Limited
General.Description: DCM Nouvelle Limited manufactures and sells cotton yarns in India. It offers better cotton initiative, organic, and slub yarns. The company provides its products under PRIMERO, DINERO, CCY, and FUTURO brand names. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1991 and is based in New Delhi, India.

3.Name: Mr. Rakesh Kumar Goel
3.Title: Whole Time Director & Exec. Director of Textiles
